name: Understanding K8s Concepts Through Cartoons
desc: Interactive MCQs with cartoons to simplify complex Operating System topics.

slides.questionEn: **What is Kubernetes primarily used for?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: Kubernetes is mainly used for what purpose?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes mukhya roop se kis liye upyog hota hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes mukhya roop se kis liye upyog hota hai?
slides.explanationEn: Kubernetes is primarily used for **Container Orchestration**. It helps in managing containerized applications across a cluster of machines.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes mukhya roop se Container Orchestration ke liye upyog hota hai. Yeh ek cluster of machines par containerized applications ko manage karne mein madad karta hai.

slides.questionEn: **Which company originally developed Kubernetes?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: Kubernetes was originally developed by which company?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes ko mool roop se kaunsi company ne develop kiya tha?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes ko mool roop se kaunsi company ne develop kiya tha?
slides.explanationEn: Kubernetes was originally developed by **Google**. It was later donated to the Cloud Native Computing Foundation.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes ko mool roop se Google ne develop kiya tha. Baad mein isse Cloud Native Computing Foundation ko donate kar diya gaya.

slides.questionEn: **Which language is Kubernetes written in?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: Kubernetes is written in which programming language?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes kis programming language mein likhi gayi hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes kis programming language mein likhi gayi hai?
slides.explanationEn: Kubernetes is primarily written in the **Go** programming language.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes mukhya roop se Go programming language mein likhi gayi hai.

slides.questionEn: **What is the smallest unit of deployment in Kubernetes?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: What is the smallest unit for deploying applications in Kubernetes?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes mein deployment ka sabse chhota unit kya hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes mein deployment ka sabse chhota unit kya hai?
slides.explanationEn: In Kubernetes, the smallest unit of deployment is a **Pod**. A Pod can contain one or more containers.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes mein deployment ka sabse chhota unit Pod hota hai. Ek Pod mein ek ya usse adhik containers ho sakte hain.

slides.questionEn: **What does K8s stand for?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: What does the abbreviation K8s represent?
slides.questionHi: **K8s ka full form kya hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: K8s ka full form kya hai?
slides.explanationEn: K8s is an abbreviation for **Kubernetes**. The number 8 represents the eight letters between the 'K' and 's' in Kubernetes.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: K8s ka full form Kubernetes hota hai. Yahan 8 number Kubernetes ke 'K' aur 's' ke beech ke aath letters ko represent karta hai.

slides.questionEn: **Which command is used to get information about all pods?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: Which command is used to get details about all the pods in Kubernetes?
slides.questionHi: **Sabhi pods ke baare mein jaankari paane ke liye kaunsa command use hota hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Sabhi pods ke baare mein jaankari paane ke liye kaunsa command use hota hai?

rightAnswer.speaking: Sahi jawab kubectl get pods hai

slides.explanationEn: The command **`kubectl get pods`** is used to get information about all the pods in a Kubernetes cluster.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes cluster mein sabhi pods ke baare mein jaankari paane ke liye `kubectl get pods` command ka use hota hai.

slides.questionEn: **What is the default namespace in Kubernetes?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: What is the default namespace used in Kubernetes?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes mein default namespace kya hota hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes mein default namespace kya hota hai?
slides.explanationEn: In Kubernetes, the **default** namespace is used for resources with no other namespace.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes mein, kisi bhi aur namespace ke bina resources ke liye **default** namespace ka use hota hai.

slides.questionEn: **Which Kubernetes object is used to expose an application?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: Which Kubernetes object is commonly used to expose an application to the outside world?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes mein application ko bahar expose karne ke liye kaunsa object use hota hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes mein application ko bahar expose karne ke liye kaunsa object use hota hai?
slides.explanationEn: In Kubernetes, a **Service** is the object that is used to expose an application to the outside world.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes mein, application ko bahar expose karne ke liye **Service** object ka use hota hai.

slides.questionEn: **What is Helm used for in Kubernetes?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: What is the purpose of using Helm in Kubernetes?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes mein Helm ka kya upyog hota hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes mein Helm ka kya upyog hota hai?
slides.explanationEn: Helm is used for **Package Management** in Kubernetes. It helps in defining, installing, and upgrading even the most complex Kubernetes applications.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes mein Helm ka upyog **Package Management** ke liye hota hai. Yeh sabse jatil Kubernetes applications ko define, install, aur upgrade karne mein madad karta hai.

slides.questionEn: **Which command is used to apply a configuration file in Kubernetes?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: Which command is used to apply a configuration file in Kubernetes?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes mein configuration file apply karne ke liye kaunsa command use hota hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes mein configuration file apply karne ke liye kaunsa command use hota hai?
slides.explanationEn: The command **`kubectl apply -f`** is used to apply a configuration file in Kubernetes.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes mein configuration file apply karne ke liye `kubectl apply -f` command ka use hota hai.

slides.questionEn: **What is the role of the Kubelet in a Kubernetes cluster?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: What is the role of the Kubelet in a Kubernetes cluster?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes cluster mein Kubelet ka kya role hota hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes cluster mein Kubelet ka kya role hota hai?
slides.explanationEn: In a Kubernetes cluster, the **Kubelet** is responsible for Node Management. It ensures that containers are running in a Pod.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes cluster mein, Kubelet ka role Node Management hota hai. Yeh dekhta hai ki Pod mein containers sahi se chal rahe hain ya nahi.

slides.questionEn: **Which Kubernetes object defines a desired state for an application?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: Which Kubernetes object is used to define the desired state for an application?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes mein application ke liye desired state define karne wala object kaunsa hota hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes mein application ke liye desired state define karne wala object kaunsa hota hai?
slides.explanationEn: In Kubernetes, a **Deployment** object is used to define the desired state for an application.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes mein, application ke liye desired state define karne ke liye **Deployment** object ka use hota hai.

slides.questionEn: **What is the main role of a Kubernetes Master node?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: What is the primary role of a Master node in a Kubernetes cluster?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes Master node ka mukhya role kya hota hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes Master node ka mukhya role kya hota hai?
slides.explanationEn: The main role of a Kubernetes Master node is **Cluster Management**. It is responsible for the overall control of the cluster.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes Master node ka mukhya role **Cluster Management** hota hai. Yeh cluster ke overall control ke liye responsible hota hai.

slides.questionEn: **What is the Kubernetes API server responsible for?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: What is the responsibility of the Kubernetes API server?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes API server ka kya kaam hota hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes API server ka kya kaam hota hai?

rightAnswer.speaking: Sahi jawab Exposing Kubernetes API hai

slides.explanationEn: The Kubernetes API server is responsible for **Exposing the Kubernetes API**. It acts as the front-end for the Kubernetes control plane.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes API server ka kaam **Kubernetes API ko expose karna** hota hai. Yeh Kubernetes control plane ka front-end ka kaam karta hai.

slides.questionEn: **Which command is used to delete a pod in Kubernetes?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: Which command is used to delete a pod in Kubernetes?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes mein pod delete karne ke liye kaunsa command use hota hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes mein pod delete karne ke liye kaunsa command use hota hai?

rightAnswer.speaking: Sahi jawab kubectl delete pod hai

slides.explanationEn: The command **`kubectl delete pod`** is used to delete a pod in Kubernetes.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes mein pod delete karne ke liye `kubectl delete pod` command ka use hota hai.

slides.questionEn: **What is the purpose of a ConfigMap in Kubernetes?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: What is the purpose of using a ConfigMap in Kubernetes?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes mein ConfigMap ka kya upyog hota hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes mein ConfigMap ka kya upyog hota hai?
slides.explanationEn: In Kubernetes, a **ConfigMap** is used for Configuration Management. It allows you to decouple configuration artifacts from image content.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes mein, Configuration Management ke liye **ConfigMap** ka upyog hota hai. Yeh aapko image content se configuration artifacts alag karne ki anumati deta hai.

slides.questionEn: **What is the role of etcd in a Kubernetes cluster?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: What is the role of etcd in a Kubernetes cluster?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes cluster mein etcd ka kya role hota hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes cluster mein etcd ka kya role hota hai?
slides.explanationEn: In a Kubernetes cluster, **etcd** serves as the Data Store. It stores the configuration data and state of the cluster.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes cluster mein, **etcd** Data Store ka kaam karta hai. Yeh cluster ke configuration data aur state ko store karta hai.

slides.questionEn: **Which Kubernetes object is used to manage a group of replica Pods?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: Which Kubernetes object is used to manage a group of replica Pods?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes mein replica Pods ke group ko manage karne ke liye kaunsa object use hota hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes mein replica Pods ke group ko manage karne ke liye kaunsa object use hota hai?
slides.explanationEn: In Kubernetes, a **Deployment** is used to manage a group of replica Pods.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes mein, replica Pods ke group ko manage karne ke liye **Deployment** ka use hota hai.

slides.questionEn: **What is the purpose of a Kubernetes Ingress?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: What is the purpose of using a Kubernetes Ingress?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes Ingress ka kya upyog hota hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes Ingress ka kya upyog hota hai?

rightAnswer.speaking: Sahi jawab HTTP Traffic Management hai

slides.explanationEn: In Kubernetes, an **Ingress** is used for HTTP Traffic Management. It routes external HTTP/HTTPS traffic to services within the cluster.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes mein, **Ingress** ka upyog HTTP Traffic Management ke liye hota hai. Yeh external HTTP/HTTPS traffic ko cluster ke andar ke services tak route karta hai.

slides.questionEn: **What is the role of a Kubernetes Node?**
slides.questionEnSpeak: What is the role of a Node in a Kubernetes cluster?
slides.questionHi: **Kubernetes Node ka kya role hota hai?**
slides.questionHiSpeak: Kubernetes Node ka kya role hota hai?
slides.explanationEn: In a Kubernetes cluster, the role of a Node is to **run containers**. It hosts the Pods that are the components of the application workload.
slides.explanationEnSpeak: Kubernetes cluster mein, Node ka role **containers chalana** hota hai. Yeh Pods ko host karta hai jo application workload ke components hote hain.
